title: Multiplying the Numerator and Denominator
text: We can multiply the numerators and denominators to get $$\frac{12x^2 y^3}{3y^3 x^2}$$

title: Simplifying if Necessary
text: We can simplify this fraction by dividing the common terms from the numerator and denominator. If we do this, we will get $$\frac{12}{3}$$, which becomes $$4$$.
